pages.text: This is the spawn in the Building World

pages.title: Building World
pages.text: $(li)PVP disabled$(li)Claims enabled$(li)Claim Trader at Spawn$(li)Mining World Portal at Spawn

pages.title: Claiming
pages.text: Wander around till you find your place to build.$(br2)Press $(l)M$() to open the World Map.$(br2)Hold right-click and select the area you want to claim.$(br2)Click $(l)Claim Selected$()$(br2)You can buy more Chunks from the $(l)Claim Trader$(). (Found at Spawn in Build World)
